title: Host Interactions of HIV factors
description: Like all viruses, HIV-1 must co-opt the host cell macromolecular transport and processing machinery. HIV-1 Vpr and Rev proteins play key roles in this co-optation. Efficient HIV-1 replication likewise requires evasion of APOBEC3G-mediated mutagenesis of reverse transcripts, a process mediated by the viral Vif protein.  View original pathway at [http://www.reactome.org/PathwayBrowser/#DIAGRAM=162909 Reactome].
